content.raw:
There is a [test failure](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/306/testReport/junit/(root)/JointControllerTest/VelocityControl/) that got missed in pull request #1273

~~~
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/joint_controller.cc:90
The difference between vel and 0.2 is 0.13338556245500782, which exceeds 0.05, where
vel evaluates to 0.066614437544992189,
0.2 evaluates to 0.20000000000000001, and
0.05 evaluates to 0.050000000000000003.
~~~
